task_management_rules.condition: meeting scheduled within 1 day or urgent
task_management_rules.action: set high priority and immediate reminders
task_management_rules.rule: If meeting is scheduled within 24 hours or marked urgent, automatically set as high priority with frequent reminders

task_management_rules.action: set highest priority and focus completely
task_management_rules.rule: When project deadline is within 24 hours, automatically set as highest priority and cancel non-essential activities
If feeling unwell or sick, reschedule all non-essential meetings and prioritize rest
Always prioritize client emergencies over internal work, personal tasks, and meetings
When double booked, keep the meeting with higher business value and reschedule the other
Never take work calls after 6pm unless marked as urgent or client emergency
If haven't been to gym for 3+ days, prioritize gym session over non-urgent meetings
Use morning hours (8am-11am) for deep work and avoid scheduling meetings during this time
Always respond to important emails within 4 hours during business days
Protect family dinner time (6pm-8pm) and weekend family activities from work interruptions
